abstract: Citigroup’s global head of energy mergers and acquisitions is making the move to Bank of America Merrill Lynch to become a managing director in the firm’s energy practice.
snippet: Citigroup’s global head of energy mergers and acquisitions is making the move to Bank of America Merrill Lynch to become a managing director in the firm’s energy practice.
lead_paragraph: Alan Murray, Citigroup’s global head of energy mergers and acquisitions, is making the move to Bank of America Merrill Lynch to become a managing director in the firm’s energy practice.

headline.main: Energy Dealmaker Joins BofA Merrill Lynch

abstract: E*Trade’s mobile application lets you buy and sell stock with ease, while Bank of America’s application provides a basic way to keep an eye on your bank accounts.
snippet: E*Trade’s mobile application lets you buy and sell stock with ease, while Bank of America’s application provides a basic way to keep an eye on your bank accounts.
lead_paragraph: Let’s stipulate that most people who keep constant vigil over their investment accounts these days are either masochists or eternal optimists. They’re also a bank’s best friend.

headline.main: A Convenient Way to Track Your Struggling Investments
headline.print_headline: A Convenient Way to Track Your Struggling Investments
